ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How do I update my account information?

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
Account Information Changes
Email Address:

  1. Send an email to compliance@ndax.io from the email address associated with your Ndax account including:
    • A selfie of you holding a handwritten note with today's date and your request.
    • The front and back copy of a non-expired PHOTO ID.

Username:

  1. You are unable to change your username.
  2. For steps on how to retrieve your username, click here: NDAX â€“ I forgot my username

Billing Address, Occupation and Phone Number:

  1. Log in to your Ndax account
  2. Click Settings on the left-hand side toolbar
  3. Select the information you would like to change and click Change
  4. Enter your updated information
